name: Teva Tirra CT Sandals - Women's
description:
As a new member of the popular Tirra family, the Tirra CT offers same supportive comfort, but adds a slipper-like toe cap.Quick drying straps and toe cap made from REPREVE® recycled polyester.Structured straps provide even support.Cushioned Shoc Pad™ in the heel absorbs impactContoured EVA footbed.Nylon shank.Outsoles are non-marking Spider Rubber®.Treated with Microban®, a zinc-based antimicrobial

        Sustainability
